context: I like world war Z do you know who directed it?

Well, he's also a recurring writer on Saturday Night Live. Do you like that show?
Yes I am from New York i like that show alot its great. Tina Fey is a regular appearance
resp: I love Tina Fey! I actually just watched Mean Girls with her and Amy Poehler. So funny!
